edits.original_text: When these people howl, they howl to be heard
edits.corrected_text: When these people howl, they howl to be heard.

edits.original_text: Ah! but these people are always howling. Never happy otherwise
edits.corrected_text: Ah! but these people are always howling. Never happy otherwise.

edits.original_text: Do you mean the Marseilles people
edits.corrected_text: Do you mean the Marseilles people?

edits.original_text: As to Marseilles, we know what Marseilles is
edits.corrected_text: As to Marseilles, we know what Marseilles is.

edits.original_text: It sent the most insurrectionary tune into the world that was ever composed. It couldn’t exist without alllonging and marshonging to something or other —victory or death, or blazes, or something
edits.corrected_text: It sent the most insurrectionary tune into the world that was ever composed. It couldn’t exist without alllonging and marshonging to something or other —victory or death, or blazes, or something.

edits.original_text: The speaker, with a whimsical good humour upon him all the time, looked over the parapet-wall with the greatest disparagement of Marseilles; and taking up a determined position by putting his hands in his pockets and rattling his money at it, apostrophised it with a short laugh
edits.corrected_text: The speaker, with a whimsical good humour upon him all the time, looked over the parapet-wall with the greatest disparagement of Marseilles; and taking up a determined position by putting his hands in his pockets and rattling his money at it, apostrophised it with a short laugh.

edits.original_text: It would be more creditable to you, I think, to let other people alllong and marshong about their lawful business, instead of shutting 'em up in quarantine
edits.corrected_text: It would be more creditable to you, I think, to let other people alllong and marshong about their lawful business, instead of shutting 'em up in quarantine!

edits.original_text: But we shall be out to-day
edits.corrected_text: But we shall be out to-day.

edits.original_text: It's almost an aggravation of the enormity, that we shall be out to-day. Out! What have we ever been in for
edits.corrected_text: It's almost an aggravation of the enormity, that we shall be out to-day. Out! What have we ever been in for?
